=== AnscaMobile Corona API ===

Corona API files for version 2011.268. These files are generated from Corona api resources pages ([[http://developer.anscamobile.com/resources/apis/|developer.anscamobile.com/resources/apis/]]). Check "[[https://bitbucket.org/sylvanaar2/lua-for-idea/wiki/Home|Idea Lua Support Wiki]]" page for how to use them.

Download link:
[[https://bitbucket.org/Cagatay/corona-api-support-under-lua-for-idea/downloads/corona_api.zip|bitbucket.org/Cagatay/corona-api-support-under-lua-for-idea/downloads/corona_api.zip]]
